review:
loved this movie because of below mentioned reasons;-
1. akshay kumar
2. kareena kapoor
3. nadeem shravan
4. some beautiful and soulful lyrics
5. few awesome dialogues, specially between akshay & kareena towards finale such as "ek mehbooba toh bewafaa ho sakti hai lekin ek maa nahi"
film is great but what i love about this film is it's music by nadeem-shravan, so haunting and so melodious. lyrics are great. hope they return back to bollywood soon.

'ek dilruba ' song is best . udit sir voice is awesome...
